citations.narrative:
*** At the time of this inspection, several dog runs equiped with chicken watering devices were found to have wood
chip bedding in the basins. Such accumulations could lead to contamination and/or water flow blockage.
Correct by 2/21/2014
An exit interview was conducted on 2/12/2014

narrative:
3.10
WATERING.
***  At the time of this inspection, several dog runs equiped with chicken watering devices were found to have wood
chip bedding in the basins.  Such accumulations could lead to contamination and/or water flow blockage.
Correct by 2/21/2014
An exit interview was conducted on 2/12/2014
